Containers.Name: LLDP for UNRAID
Containers.Description: A plugin that integrates a Link Layer Discovery Protocol service into UNRAID systems (speaking LLDP, CDP, FDP, SONMP and EDP). LLDP allows you to know exactly on which port is a server (and reciprocally). LLDP is an industry standard protocol designed to supplant proprietary Link-Layer protocols. The goal of LLDP is to provide an inter-vendor compatible mechanism to deliver Link-Layer notifications to adjacent network devices.
Containers.Changes: ###2024.02.26 - release note: welcome to the first version of the LLDP package. - release note: please report any problems in the respective support topic.
